Interdictor Drone

2 HP, 3 STR

• Hovering silver cube the size of a toaster with a large central green oculus.

• Stares at anything moving in its territory (becoming immoble); radiates a bright green beam at its target.

• Staring at a target slows it down by half. A second drone staring means that they can only move or attack. A third drone means that the target cannot move.

• 1-in-6 chance that a Specialist can repair a broken Interdictor Drone and reprogram it to protect an area.

category: monsters source: discord
